sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Shield of the Righteous deals 10% increased damage and grants 3% damage reduction.
(4) Set: Casting a Holy Power ability increases the damage and healing you deal during your next Avenging Wrath by 0.5%. This effect stacks.

name: Skyscorcher Pauldrons
description: For all your radiation dampening needs.

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 10 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
(4) Set: While you have  Luck of the Draw! Shield of the Righteous refunds 1-3 Holy Power and extends the duration of  Luck of the Draw! by 0.5 sec, up to 10 sec.

spells.description: Use: Offer to bind your spirit with that of another player also wearing this ring. This binding is permanent, but can be severed at the cost of 1 Blasphemite. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to empower each unique gem color of an ally's socketed gems. This boon grants 391 to each empowered secondary stat for 15 sec. This effect will always target your bonded ally, if able.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Grasp the shard tightly to enrich yourself with crystalline energy, increasing your Mastery by 6,204 for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: The shard draws in remnant energy from defeated enemies, increasing your Mastery by 131 for 15 sec, up to 5 times.

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,401 Strength. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 79,040 Nature damage over 8 sec.
